summary: This is an FBI FD-1023 form documenting information from a Confidential Human Source (CHS) regarding Boris Nikolic, Southern Trust, and Southern Country International, with a synopsis mentioning wire fraud. The document is part of case 272-SJ-3262541.

keyFacts: The document is an FBI FD-1023 form, used for reporting information from Confidential Human Sources.
The report concerns Boris Nikolic in connection with entities named Southern Trust and Southern Country International.
The synopsis of the report mentions 'Wire Fraud'.
The document is associated with FBI case ID #272-SJ-3262541.
